description:
Blocks caribou (the on screen keyboard) from popping up when you use a touchscreen. Even if it's disabled in the accessibility services menu. Note, only tested on gnome shell version 3.26
Workaround for: https://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=742246
name: Block Caribou
